thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Equinix Sees Q2 2018 Revenue $1.257 Bln To $1.267 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Equinix Sees Q2 2018 Revenue $1.257 Bln To $1.267 Bln
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Equinix Inc:
* Q1 REVENUE ROSE 28 PERCENT TO $1.216 BILLION * Q2 RECURRING CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO RANGE BETWEEN $42 MILLION AND $52 MILLION
* FY 2018 NON-RECURRING CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO RANGE BETWEEN $1.8 BILLION AND $1.9 BILLION
* QTRLY DILUTED NET INCOME PER SHARE $0.79 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.04 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 REVENUE VIEW $1.24 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $5.04 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
